snippet: State Senator Malcolm A. Smith’s fate may hinge on how the jury interprets his often inscrutable responses in a taped conversation with an undercover agent and a government informer.
abstract: Bribery and wire fraud trial of New York State Sen Malcolm A Smith, who is accused of bribing officials to put him on ballot for New York City mayor in 2013, continues at federal courthouse; Smith's fate may hinge on how jury interprets his often inscrutable responses in taped conversation with undercover agent and government informer.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Malcolm A. Smith’s fate may hinge on how the jury interprets his often inscrutable responses in a taped conversation with an undercover agent and a government informer.

headline.main: At Senator’s Trial, Video Shows Discussion of Paying G.O.P. Leaders for Support
headline.print_headline: At Senator’s Trial, Video Shows Discussion of Paying G.O.P. Leaders for Support
